Leaderboard

Top-10 fish caught on our rivers.

From time to time we hold competitions for the biggest fish caught in our rivers. Here you see the honor board - the ten fishermen who caught the biggest fish of all time.

Stay tuned.
Our first fishing will take place in 2021 season.
